name: The 3rdEye Case
description:
Minimum Requirement :

Operating system version Windows 7 (SP1+) Windows 8 and Windows 10

Memory : 4gb Ram

GPU : Direct X, Minimum 1gb

1)Download the game

2)Extract files where you want them to be

3)Open The3rdEyeCase.exe

Play with headset for a better experience.

You can play with a controller.

This game was made by one guy.
